lines.text: Not knowing where your daughter is!

[to Alicia in Classroom]
Literature and History always meet.
Just a little longer. One more story.
The one about the invisible paint? This paint makes things invisible. For instance, we paint your bed and it vanishes. Then mommy will think you're sleeping in mid-air.
Mommy, is she like Dolores? Is she your "divided" friend?

[to Roberto]
Gaby is wonderful. She says I'm the "divided" friend.

[laughing]
She can't pronounce devoted. She loves the word and uses it constantly.
You're looking good. I never saw you in a skirt before. Europe was good for you, wasn't it? It seems to have polished up your edges.
Dolores is lucky to have such a devoted friend as you.
